item_list.name: Perfect Chocolate Cake
item_list.description: Perfectly moist and delicious, every time!

key: ¾ cup (90 g) unsweetened cocoa powder

item_list.name: Lemon Blueberry Cake
item_list.description: This Lemon Blueberry Cake with loads of gorgeous Zucchini is going to be your new favorite dessert!!

key: 2 cups finely shredded and lightly drained zucchini
3 large eggs, lightly beaten, room temperature

item_list.name: Cream Cheese Pound Cake
item_list.description: By far the best Cream Cheese Pound Cake I have ever eaten or shared! This pound cake recipe will surely become a classic in your home.

key: 1¼ cups (2½ sticks or 284g) salted butter, room temperature

item_list.name: Cream Filled Yellow Cake
item_list.description: BCream Filled Yellow Cake is a moist bundt cake that is filled with a marshmallow and whipped topping filling to remind you of a Twinkie.

key: 1 cup whipped topping, like cool whip

item_list.name: Rhubarb Cake
item_list.description: Rhubarb Cake is a soft, moist, and flavorful cake full of diced rhubarb and topped with granulated sugar that is simple to make and a dessert everyone will love!

key: ¼ cup (50 g) granulated sugar for topping

item_list.name: Strawberry Woolworth Icebox Cheesecake
item_list.description: Strawberry Woolworth Icebox Cheesecake is a light and fluffy no-bake dessert with fresh strawberries and a graham cracker crust.

key: 2 cups (14-16 sheets, 168 g) honey graham crackers, finely crushed
1 block (8 ounces) cream cheese, room temperature
1 can (12 ounces) evaporated milk, chilled in the freezer

item_list.name: Raspberry Oatmeal Cookies
item_list.description: Raspberry Oatmeal Cookies are soft and chewy oatmeal cookies loaded with old-fashioned rolled oats and frozen raspberries.

key: 1 cup (2 sticks, 227 g) salted butter, softened
1 cup (200 g) light brown sugar, packed
1 cup (250 g) frozen raspberries, roughly chopped

item_list.name: Spritz Cookie
item_list.description: This Spritz Cookie Recipe gives you rich, buttery cookies made with a cookie press for a decorative design.

key: 1 cup (2 sticks, 227 g) unsalted butter, softened

item_list.name: Toffee Icebox Cookies
item_list.description: Toffee Icebox Cookies are rich and buttery cookies with chocolate-covered toffee bits you can taste in every bite.

key: 1 cup (2 sticks / 227 g) unsalted butter, softened
1 cup chocolate-covered toffee bits, reserving ¼ cup for topping

item_list.name: Twix Inspired Cookies
item_list.description: These cookies are large, soft, butter cookie that is topped with caramel and melted milk chocolate.

key: 1 bag (11 ounces) caramel bits or caramel candies, unwrapped
1 bag (11 ounces) caramel bits or caramel candies, unwrapped

item_list.name: Twix Inspired Cookies
item_list.description: These cookies are large, soft, butter cookie that is topped with caramel and melted milk chocolate.

key: 1 bag (11 ounces) caramel bits or caramel candies, unwrapped
1 bag (11 ounces) caramel bits or caramel candies, unwrapped

item_list.name: Triple Chocolate Blossoms
item_list.description: Triple Chocolate Blossoms give you a triple threat of chocolate with a chocolate cookie, chocolate frosting, and a Hershey's kiss on top!

key: 1 bag (11 ounces) caramel bits or caramel candies, unwrapped
1 bag (11 ounces) caramel bits or caramel candies, unwrapped

item_list.name: Peanut Butter Cream Pie
item_list.description: Peanut Butter Cream Pie is as creamy as it is easy to make with an Oreo cookie crust filled with a peanut butter filling, topped with chopped peanuts.

key: 1 package (8 ounces) cream cheese, room temperature
½ cup (129 g) creamy peanut butter
¼ cup (37 g) chopped peanuts (optional garnish for the top)

item_list.name: Chocolate Chess Pie
item_list.description: Chocolate Chess Pie is a fudgy chocolate pie filling made in a flaky crust that will satisfy all the chocolate lovers out there!

key: 1 9-inch unbaked pie crust, store-bought or homemade
¼ cup (½ stick, 57g) unsalted butter, melted and slightly cooled
1 can (5 ounces or ⅔ cup) evaporated milk

item_list.name: Apple Pie
item_list.description: Apple Pie has all the flavors of an apple pie, but it is made with a graham cracker crust and you don't even need to turn on your oven!

key: 1 9-inch unbaked pie crust, store-bought or homemade
¼ cup (½ stick, 57g) unsalted butter, melted and slightly cooled
1 can (5 ounces or ⅔ cup) evaporated milk

item_list.name: Blueberry Pie
item_list.description: Blue berry Pie is as creamy as it is easy to make with an Oreo cookie crust filled with a peanut butter filling, topped with chopped peanuts.

key: 1 package (8 ounces) cream cheese, room temperature
½ cup (129 g) creamy peanut butter
¼ cup (37 g) chopped peanuts (optional garnish for the top)

item_list.name: Cherry hand Pie
item_list.description: Cherry Hand Pies are mini pie crusts filled with homemade cherry pie filling, fried to a golden brown, and drizzled with an almond glaze.

key: 1 package (8 ounces) cream cheese, room temperature
½ cup (129 g) creamy peanut butter
¼ cup (37 g) chopped peanuts (optional garnish for the top)

item_list.name: Pumpkin Pie Pop Tart
item_list.description: Pumpkin Pie Pop Tarts are made with a homemade pie crust filled with a pumpkin filling and topped with a brown sugar glaze sprinkled with pumpkin pie spice.

key: ¼ cup (50 g) light brown sugar, packed
¼ cup (37 g) chopped peanuts (optional garnish for the top)
